item.title: Why your ecommerce startup will fail in Nepal
item.description: Everyone back in Nepal want to grab the lucarative ecommerce business which seems to be doing well in India along with other part of Asia but thing here in Nepal is quite different. Beforing going big with ecommerce business you should know the business ecosystem of Nepal along with the user behaviour and tech penetration. Most e-commerce websites/startups based in Nepal fail due to the various reasons. Letâ€™s check out some reason which can push your e-commerce into the dead-pool.
